Reviews.Title: Great Laptop!
Reviews.Author: M. Koenig "Mark"
Reviews.Content: No complaints, screen is big and vivid.Battery time about 5 hours. Wish it was longer.Stays nice and cool. Can handle 16 gig of memory.I added 8 gig for a total 12 gig.

Reviews.Title: 17", intel chips, good price.
Reviews.Author: diep nuven
Reviews.Content: It fits my needs although it is a bit heavy. It was shipped in a box three times longer than it needs.

Reviews.Title: Great value.
Reviews.Author: TruthSeeker
Reviews.Content: Really like the lightweight of this particular 17" laptop. Also seems to have very quick processor and hard drive performance compared to earlier Intel dual core processors. The screen is sharp and bright as well. The speakers leave a lot to be desired, but they may not be significantly different than most non-multi-media or non-game-based designed systems.

ProductInfo.Features:
Processor: i3-3120M
Memory: 4GB DDR3
Hard Drive: 500GB
Screen: 17.3" LED
Windows 8
